##
## AUTOGENERATED BY PRIG/SCAFFOLD. DO NOT MODIFY.
## If you need to add things to here, please have a look at that file:
##    cmake/rukh.cmake
##
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

# Including Scaffold
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/third_party/scaffold/cmake")
include(scaffold)

sf_init_project(rukh)

sf_set_cxxstd(17)
sf_add_common_compiler_flags()

# FIXME ME: BAD
add_definitions(-std=gnu++1z)

add_subdirectory("third_party")
include_directories("third_party")


include(cmake/rukh.cmake)
sf_add_default_subdirectories()

add_subdirectory(samples)
add_subdirectory(rukh)
